name: Jonathan
description:
Intro

Welcome to the Island of St Helena. You play the starring role as the island's most famous resident*.

What will the day have in store for you?

Instructions:

Use the mouse to look around and WASD to move. The E key lets you interact with characters. I recommend you use the fullscreen button to get the best experience. You should also play with speakers or headphones and turn it up a notch if possible.

Hearing impaired players will find visual cues to supplement the audio.

*Possibly the second most famous, but I'll let you Google the other one.
